titles.title: To waive certain requirement under the Small Business Act for disaster relief assistance.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H698-699)
Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Referred to the Subcommittee on SBA Legislation and the General Economy.

committee.name: House Small Business
committee.subcommittee: SBA Legislation and the General Economy

bill.summary: 2/18/1993--Introduced. Entitles certain regulated public utility companies and interstate transportation providers operating in areas affected by Hurricanes Andrew or Iniki or Typhoon Omar to apply for and receive disaster assistance loans under appropriate provisions of the Small Business Act without regard to: (1) the size of the qualifying business; (2) the availability of non-Federal sources of credit; or (3) the maximum amount of assistance established under such provisions or related regulations.
